lead_paragraph: BALLAN--Lynn (Gartman), passed away on November 9, 2014 at the age of 77. She is survived by her husband Jerome; her daughters Beth Cohen and Stacy Kron; their spouses Douglas and Kurtis; her grandchildren and her brother Warren Gartman and his spouse Susan. Lynn was very much loved and will be terribly missed. A memorial service will be held on Sunday, November 16, at The Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave. at West 91st St. in Manhattan at 2pm.
